description: I liked this guy´s passion for his trade. He was a car mechanic and I could tell he loved it. He turned car fixing into poetry. I knew a car shop that needed a painter. The boy was definitely in but refused to pay our mediation fee right away. I didn´t mind that because his cute face and lean body were giving me a boner already. Getting him to undress proved to be very difficult, he kept declining my filthy offers. He was even worried that I might tell his girlfriend. Like if I gave a shit about her! Well, she can wait for the video... Anyways, I had to reach deep into my pocket to convince the guy. He sucked me really nicely, he truly had a hidden talent. His ass proved to be more problematic. He could barely take my cock. But the tried hard, he wanted the money.
title: Dirty Scout 150
